Description.TranslatedText: A grouping of individuals on the basis of a shared procedure or disease, or lack thereof (e.g. healthy volunteers, type 2 diabetic subjects, subjects with renal cell cancer). Standardized naming systems are available that define the groups within which a subject should be placed. (NCI)

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An individual who is or becomes a participant in a research study and has no significant health-related issues. (NCI)
